sentences.en: Deane continued diving on the site intermittently until 1840, recovering several more guns, two bows, various timbers, part of a pump and various other small finds.
sentences.cn: 迪恩继续间歇性地在这个地方潜水直到1840年，期间又找到了几支枪、两张弓、各种木材、一个水泵的一部分和其他各种小物品。

sentences.en: The talks went on intermittently for three years.
sentences.cn: 会谈断断续续地进行了3年。
整个十一月份抗议活动此起彼落。
